text: Aur agar wuh kisī waqt yih bāt kare to hamārī aulād kah sakegī, ‘Yih qurbāngāh dekheṅ jo Rab kī qurbāngāh kī hūbahū naql hai. Hamāre bāpdādā ne ise banāyā thā, lekin is lie nahīṅ ki ham is par bhasm hone wālī qurbāniyāṅ aur zabah kī qurbāniyāṅ chaṛhāeṅ balki āp ko aur hameṅ gawāhī dene ke lie ki hameṅ mil kar Rab kī ibādat karne kā haq hai.’
